meta.title: Sarah Richardson | Founder, RETEQ
meta.description: Discover how Sarah Richardson is modernizing real estate with RETEQ, a blockchain-enabled MLS platform powered by generative AI and seamless compliance.

hero.name: Sarah Richardson
hero.title: Founder & CEO, RETEQ
hero.tagline: Re-architecting real estate with compliant, blockchain-enabled MLS infrastructure that teams actually adopt.

about.summary: Sarah Richardson is a Scottsdale-based real estate leader who scaled Tru Realty to $2B in sales across 42 states and now modernizes brokerage operations with RETEQ’s generative AI and blockchain MLS platform.

origin_story.headline: From Tru Realty to nationwide impact.
origin_story.copy: After founding Tru Realty in 2010, Sarah assembled a dedicated team that closed 450+ profitable deals in six years, expanded to 42 states, and delivered over $2B in transactions as one of the largest female-owned brokerages in the US.

inflection_point.headline: Pioneering blockchain brokerage operations.
inflection_point.copy: In 2017 she executed the first US investor cash transaction on Ethereum with partner Propy, then rebuilt her internal tooling into a generative AI assistant that now powers RETEQ’s blockchain-based MLS.

mission.headline: Rearchitect brokerage economics with a compliant, AI-native MLS platform that the early majority embraces.

pillars.title: User Adoption First
pillars.description: Hide the Web3 jargon and deliver the frictionless experience agents, brokers, and associations already expect—just better.

pillars.title: Unified Infrastructure
pillars.description: Replace fragmented point solutions with a single login that orchestrates underwriting, vendors, and client communications.

pillars.title: Truth of Source
pillars.description: Leverage distributed ledgers to become the verifiable data source that legacy MLS systems can trust.

project.name: RETEQ
project.problem: Brokerages face compressed commissions, rising compliance costs, and fragmented tech stacks with 5–10 disconnected tools across 480+ MLS databases.
project.solution: RETEQ delivers an enterprise generative AI platform layered on blockchain-backed MLS infrastructure, changing the economics of running a brokerage with single sign-on, compliant automation, and verifiable data pipelines.
value_proposition: Cut logins from ten to one while preserving familiar workflows and nomenclature.
Deploy the first LLM that mimics a broker’s response with 98% accuracy, accelerating escrow by days.
Provide associations and brokers with ledger-backed audit trails that ingest NAR settlement updates in real time.

experience.headline: RETEQ brings MLS modernization to the professionals who need it now.
copy: Agents and brokers gain a single secure login that mirrors their existing tech stack—but smarter and faster.
Associations manage inventory, compliance, and communications through a broker-grade AI assistant delivering immediate, accurate answers.
Vendors integrate once and collaborate across the entire ecosystem without losing data fidelity or compliance context.

features: Single sign-on portal covering legacy MLS tools and proprietary workflows
Generative AI broker assistant trained on NAR, AAR, and custom policies with 98% accuracy
Distributed ledger accounting, audit trails, and end-ledger reporting
Role-based dashboards for brokers, agents, associations, vendors, and compliance teams

traction.industry_backing: Supported by Arizona’s BitAngels network, Keller Williams International, and Tru Realty alumni collaborating on the end-to-end platform.
traction.market_insight: Addresses 480+ MLS databases nationwide—14 in Arizona alone—while adapting instantly to NAR settlement documentation.

call_to_action.headline: Ready to modernize your MLS operations?

highlights: Scaled Tru Realty into one of the largest female-owned brokerages in the US, expanding to 42 states and $2B in sales.
Rebuilt an internal brokerage platform into RETEQ’s enterprise generative AI system embedded within a blockchain MLS.
Designs for the early majority: fewer passwords, familiar interfaces, and quietly powerful Web3 infrastructure.
First US realtor to execute an investor cash transaction on Ethereum, proving Sarah’s compliance-first approach to innovation.
Works with Arizona ecosystem leaders to assemble the end-to-end solution real estate has waited decades for.

quotes.speaker: Sarah Richardson
quotes.text: I’m a local Phoenician. Live here over in Scottsdale, Arizona—and my domain expertise is in real estate.

quotes.speaker: Sarah Richardson
quotes.text: I have now re-architected that into a generative AI solution embedded into a blockchain-based MLS system.

quotes.speaker: Sarah Richardson
quotes.text: The average age of a real estate agent is about 56 to 57 years old—they hear Web3 and they just glaze over.

quotes.speaker: Sarah Richardson
quotes.text: When we can create an ecosystem that mimics those 5 to 10 technologies with one login, we believe we can have mass adoption.

quotes.speaker: Sarah Richardson
quotes.text: We need to be the truth of source for the data—and we’ve found a way to push into those legacy systems.

timeline.event: Began as an agent and broker across residential and commercial real estate.
Launched Tru Realty to capitalize on MLS-driven deal flow, growing to 42 states and 450+ profitable transactions.
Became the first US realtor to execute an investor cash transaction on Ethereum in partnership with Propy.
Rebuilt internal tools as a generative AI solution to streamline brokerage operations.
Embedded the AI platform into a blockchain-based MLS, partnering with Arizona innovators to deliver the first end-to-end solution.

supporters.name: Arizona BitAngels Network
supporters.highlight: Connecting technologists, regulators, and investors to accelerate RETEQ’s end-to-end platform.

supporters.name: Tru Realty & Keller Williams Partners
supporters.highlight: Provide design feedback across 42+ states to ensure RETEQ meets brokerage, franchise, and compliance requirements.
